overview: Ava and Joss are two scammers, who scour the small villages, in search of beautiful villas. The goal is simple: they wait until the owners go on vacation to put the house up for sale and collect the money that goes with it. Having fallen on a rare pearl, they see scrolling several colorful characters, which make this house much hotter and naughty ...
title: Scam, Sex and Stiletto Heels
